title: Page's School Report
description: Page's School Report is about two classmates whose assignment is to study and write a report on a Native American tribe. Through their research on the Makah and Mohawk tribes, the classmates discover many similarities between the two tribes, despite the differences. Illustrations support the text.
meta: challenged, complex, doubt, interesting, permanent, researching, similarities, system, temporary
